parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: The WeGA document type

methods.description: Get status information about the running WeGA-WebApp
Finds code samples by XML element

parameters.name: element
parameters.description: The XML element to search for

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The element namespace. Defaults to the TEI namespace

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: The WeGA document type

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Position of first item to retrieve (starting from 1)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve (200 max)

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: The WeGA document type

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Position of first item to retrieve (starting from 1)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve (200 max)

parameters.name: authorId
parameters.description: The author ID to search for. Accepted ID formats are WeGA, e.g. A002068 or http://weber-gesamtausgabe.de/A002068, VIAF, e.g. http://viaf.org/viaf/14959938, or  GND, e.g. http://d-nb.info/gnd/118629662

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: The WeGA document type

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Position of first item to retrieve (starting from 1)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve (200 max)

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: The min date to search for

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The max date to search for

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: The WeGA document type

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Position of first item to retrieve (starting from 1)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve (200 max)

parameters.name: docId
parameters.description: The document ID that is to be mentioned. Accepted ID formats are WeGA, e.g. A002068 or http://weber-gesamtausgabe.de/A002068, VIAF, e.g. http://viaf.org/viaf/14959938, or  GND, e.g. http://d-nb.info/gnd/118629662

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: The WeGA document type

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Position of first item to retrieve (starting from 1)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve (200 max)

parameters.name: docId
parameters.description: The document identifier to search for

parameters.name: facet
parameters.description: The facet to search for

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the result set, i.e. 'indices' or a WeGA ID

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: The search term to be looked for in the facet's label

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: The WeGA document type

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Position of first item to retrieve (starting from 1)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve (200 max)

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: The WeGA document type

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The query string

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Position of first item to retrieve (starting from 1)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve (200 max)

apiDescription:
⚠️DEPRECATION WARNING⚠️
This version of the WeGA API specification is outdated and superseded by [version 1.1.0](https://weber-gesamtausgabe.de/api/v1/openapi.json).

For feedback or requests about this API please contact stadler@weber-gesamtausgabe.de or start the discussion at https://github.com/Edirom/WeGA-WebApp
